Interface Summary

Class Summary
AdvancedOscillator AdvancedOscillator Class

DelayEffect Delay Effect
EnvelopeGenerator Envelope Generator
MusicPlayer This class plays simple tunes specified in terms of an array of Note objects.

SoftSynth Demo code for the soft synth components
VCA Digital equivalent of a Voltage Controller Amplifier or VCA.
